subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltrán set the tone against the Rockies in the first inning with a 438-foot homer to dead center field, and the barrage did not end until the ninth for the Mets.
snippet: Carlos Beltrán set the tone against the Rockies in the first inning with a 438-foot homer to dead center field, and the barrage did not end until the ninth for the Mets.
